email_content.subject: Action Required: Verify Your Microsoft Account
email_content.body_html:
Dear User,

We have detected unusual activity on your Microsoft account. To ensure your account security, please verify your credentials by clicking the link below:

Verify Account Now

If you did not request this verification, please ignore this email.

Thank you,
Microsoft Security Team
